titles.title: A bill to prohibit the usage of exploitative and deceptive practices by large online operators and to promote consumer welfare in the use of behavioral research by such providers.
Deceptive Experiences To Online Users Reduction Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
